name: Back to the Pandemic
description:
In 2196... 

 A doctor who has a time machine and an orbgun wants to return to the past and defeat the pandemics there. 

 You can face different enemies at different times. You should be ready to this because this will be harder than you think.. 

CREDITS 

Code: Baturay Üstündağ, Fazlı Balkan

 Art: Kutay Sert, Batuhan Tuğrul 

 Sound: Gizem Aydın 

Story: Eda Deniz
